field.name: picture

panel.static: There is already a partner with this name.

field.name: $viewerPartnerType
field.viewer: Prospect Employee Customer Supplier Factor Carrier

field.name: $activeBlockings
field.viewer: {{ {'1':'Remin._block','2':'Inv._block','3':'Reimb._block','4':'Debit_block','5':'Sale_block','6':'Purch._block'}[item.blockingSelect] }} Remin._block Inv._block Reimb._block Debit_block Sale_block Purch._block {{ item.blockingToDate | date:'dd/MM/yy' }}

field.name: addressL3
field.placeholder: e.g. Building A, Entry 2, 2nd Floor, Door 2E

label.title: The following address is invalid. Please use '+' button to create a new one :
label.name: addressHelper

button.name: convertToIndividualPartner
button.title: Convert into an individual partner
button.showIf: id != null && isContact == true && mainPartner == null

field.name: picture

panel.static: There is already a partner with this name.

cards.name: partner-cards
cards.title: Partners
cards.template:
{{partnerSeq}}
{{fullName}}
{{address.fullName}}
{{fixedPhone}}
{{emailAddress.address}}
{{partnerCategory.name}}

cards.name: partner-contact-cards
cards.title: Contacts
cards.template:
{{partnerSeq}}
{{fullName}}
{{contactAddress.fullName}}
{{fixedPhone}}
{{emailAddress.address}}
{{partnerCategory.name}}

panel.static: There is already a partner with this name.

attribute.name: domain
attribute.expr: eval: " (self.isCustomer = true OR self.isSupplier = true OR self.isProspect = true) AND self.isEmployee = false "
